column4: how can i get some sevice like firewall to default configuration ??
but is there no command line to do that else purge and re-install ?
most is iptables - based , which ruleset you can flush, depends on app, but doN#t ask me if this is the default-config
cause today i had to purge a program and re-install. I was curious if there is any command line to do that
f.e. sudo apt-get remove --purge ufw && sudo apt-get install ufw   will do so
